mapper.sql: A.id AS id,A.adicon_barcode AS adiconBarcode,A.patient_id AS patientId,A.doctor_id AS doctorId,A.hospital_name AS hospitalName,A.hospital_id AS hospitalId,A.doctor_result AS doctorResult,A.item_codes AS itemCodes,A.patient_name AS patientName,A.sex AS sex,A.age AS age,A.age_type AS ageType,A.department AS department,A.bed_no AS bedNo,A.collection_date AS collectionDate,A.received_date AS receivedDate,A.lis_date AS lisDate,A.report_date AS reportDate,A.customer_barcode AS customerBarcode,A.doctor AS doctor,A.technician AS technician,A.checked_by AS checkedBy,A.instrument AS instrument,A.serial_number AS serialNumber,A.sample_type AS sampleType,A.clinical_diagnosis AS clinicalDiagnosis,A.item_code AS itemCode,A.item_name_CN AS itemName_CN,A.item_name_EN AS itemName_EN,A.result AS result,A.result_hint AS resultHint,A.result_reference AS resultReference,A.result_unit AS resultUnit,A.test_method AS testMethod,A.test_method_EN AS testMethod_EN,A.result_pathology AS resultPathology,A.sample_char AS sampleChar,A.patient_number AS patientNumber,A.patient_phone AS patientPhone,A.str1 AS str1,A.str2 AS str2,A.str3 AS str3,A.str4 AS str4,A.str5 AS str5,A.service_flag AS serviceFlag,A.serial AS serial,A.type_id AS typeId,A.link_id AS linkId,A.group_id AS groupId,A.grade_id AS gradeId,A.main_status AS mainStatus,A.logic_status AS logicStatus,A.attr_decimal AS attrDecimal,A.main_ids AS mainIds,A.attr_str AS attrStr,A.attr_str2 AS attrStr2,A.attr_int AS attrInt,A.attr_int2 AS attrInt2,A.attr_num AS attrNum,A.attr_date AS attrDate,A.attr_datetime AS attrDatetime,A.sequence AS sequence,A.description AS description,A.remark AS remark,A.deleted_at AS deletedAt,A.deleted_by AS deletedBy,A.created_at AS createdAt,A.created_by AS createdBy,A.updated_at AS updatedAt,A.updated_by AS updatedBy

sql.if: AND A.patient_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM doctor_patient dp LEFT JOIN doctor d ON d.id = dp.doctor_id WHERE d.username LIKE '%${doctorName}%' OR d.realname LIKE '%${doctorName}%' )
AND A.patient_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM doctor_patient WHERE doctor_id = #{doctorId} )
AND A.patient_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM doctor_patient dp LEFT JOIN doctor d ON d.id = dp.doctor_id WHERE d.hospital_id = #{hospitalId} )
AND (A.id IS NOT NULL AND u.id = #{linkUserId} OR u.relation_id = #{linkUserId})

mapper.sql: LEFT JOIN user u ON A.patient_id = u.id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM A
WHERE A.serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
mapper.update:
